strategy.title: Important Note
steps: This achievement is NO LONGER required for the meta achievement
You can get What a Long Strange Trip without this
Only attempt if you want the achievement itself

strategy.title: Requirements (with orphan out)
steps: Arathi Basin: Assault a flag (right-click to start capture)
Alterac Valley: Assault a tower (right-click the flag inside)
Warsong Gulch: Return a dropped enemy flag
Eye of the Storm: Capture the center flag

strategy.title: Tips
steps: Queue during Children's Week when others are also trying
Communicate in BG chat - many will help each other
WSG is hardest - need enemy to drop flag near you
EotS - go mid immediately at start, grab flag first
